attributes.action: We want ICC to investigate the Uighar Muslim camps
attributes.additional_details: We cannot let these people become another history fact. History is eerily repeating itself in 2020, and we need to do something about it. This is a huge discriminatory act, and breaches so many human rights.
attributes.background: We want the government to step in and help free these people from a Holocaust 2.0

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The ICC is independent and this issue has already been bought to its attention by member states.

You can find more information about their decision not to investigate here:
https://www.icc-cpi.int/itemsDocuments/2020-PE/2020-pe-report-eng.pdf
Para 70

You may wish to sign this petition:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549020
